source:
%%sql
-- Build the IMS historic info table

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.ims_integration_dim (
    IMSIntegrationID,
    IntegrationID,
    IntegrationIDCoded,
    IMSIntegrationName,
    IMSIntegrationDateEntered,
    IMSIntegrationDateModified,
    IMSIntegrationModifiedUserID,
    IMSIntegrationModifiedByName,
    IMSIntegrationCreatedBy,
    IMSIntegrationCreatedByName,
    IMSIntegrationDescription,
    IMSIntegrationDeleted,
    IMSIntegrationCreatedByLink,
    IMSIntegrationModifiedUserLink,
    IMSIntegrationAssignedUserID,
    IMSIntegrationAssignedUserName,
    IMSIntegrationAssignedUserLink,
    IMSIntegrationSecurityGroups,
    IMSIntegrationNumber,
    IMSIntegrationType,
    IMSIntegrationStatus,
    IMSIntegrationPriority,
    IMSIntegrationResolution,
    IMSIntegrationWorkLog,
    IMSIntegrationCommissionDate,
    IMSIntegrationDecommissionDate,
    IMSIntegrationFrequency,
    IMSIntegrationNumberContainer,
    IMSIntegrationInternalExternal,
    IMSIntegrationHelp,
    IMSIntegrationEncryptionInTransit,
    IMSROPAIMSIntegration,
    IMSDPIAIMSIntegration,
    IMSDataSharingIMSIntegration,
    IMSIntegrationIMSDataflow,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
)

SELECT DISTINCT
    Row_Number() over (Order by T1.ims_integration_number NULLS LAST)      AS IMSIntegrationID,
    T1.int_id AS IntegrationID,
    T1.id AS IntegrationIDCoded,
    T1.name AS IMSIntegrationName,
    T1.date_entered AS IMSIntegrationDateEntered,
    T1.date_modified AS IMSIntegrationDateModified,
    T1.modified_user_id AS IMSIntegrationModifiedUserID,
    T1.modified_by_name AS IMSIntegrationModifiedByName,
    T1.created_by AS IMSIntegrationCreatedBy,
    T1.created_by_name AS IMSIntegrationCreatedByName,
    T1.description AS IMSIntegrationDescription,
    T1.deleted AS IMSIntegrationDeleted,
    T1.created_by_link AS IMSIntegrationCreatedByLink,
    T1.modified_user_link AS IMSIntegrationModifiedUserLink,
    T1.assigned_user_id AS IMSIntegrationAssignedUserID,
    T1.assigned_user_name AS IMSIntegrationAssignedUserName,
    T1.assigned_user_link AS IMSIntegrationAssignedUserLink,
    T1.securitygroups AS IMSIntegrationSecurityGroups,
    T1.ims_integration_number AS IMSIntegrationNumber,
    T1.type AS IMSIntegrationType,
    T1.status AS IMSIntegrationStatus,
    T1.priority AS IMSIntegrationPriority,
    T1.resolution AS IMSIntegrationResolution,
    T1.work_log AS IMSIntegrationWorkLog,
    T1.commission_date_c AS IMSIntegrationCommissionDate,
    T1.decommission_date_c AS IMSIntegrationDecommissionDate,
    T1.frequency_c AS IMSIntegrationFrequency,
    T1.int_num_container_c AS IMSIntegrationNumberContainer,
    T1.internal_external_c AS IMSIntegrationInternalExternal,
    T1.help AS IMSIntegrationHelp,
    T1.encryption_in_transit AS IMSIntegrationEncryptionInTransit,
    T1.ims_ropa_ims_integration_1 AS IMSROPAIMSIntegration,
    T1.ims_dpia_ims_integration_1 AS IMSDPIAIMSIntegration,
    T1.ims_data_sharing_ims_integration_1 AS IMSDataSharingIMSIntegration,
    T1.ims_integration_ims_data_flow_1 AS IMSIntegrationIMSDataflow,
    7                                                                           AS SourceSystemID,
    First(to_timestamp(T1.expected_from))                                       AS IngestionDate,
    NULL                                                                        AS ValidTo,
    md5(concat(
        IFNULL(T1.int_id,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.id,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.name,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.date_entered,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.date_modified,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.modified_user_id,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.modified_by_name,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.created_by,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.created_by_name,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.description,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.deleted,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.created_by_link,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.modified_user_link,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.assigned_user_id,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.assigned_user_name,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.assigned_user_link,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.securitygroups,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_integration_number,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.type,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.status,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.priority,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.resolution,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.work_log,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.commission_date_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.decommission_date_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.frequency_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.int_num_container_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.internal_external_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.help,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.encryption_in_transit,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_ropa_ims_integration_1,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_dpia_ims_integration_1,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_data_sharing_ims_integration_1,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_integration_ims_data_flow_1,'.'))) AS RowID,
    'Y'                                                                         AS IsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.ims_intergration T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "IMS" = T2.Description
WHERE T1.ims_integration_number IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY T1.int_id,
    T1.id,
    T1.name,
    T1.date_entered,
    T1.date_modified,
    T1.modified_user_id,
    T1.modified_by_name,
    T1.created_by,
    T1.created_by_name,
    T1.description,
    T1.deleted,
    T1.created_by_link,
    T1.modified_user_link,
    T1.assigned_user_id,
    T1.assigned_user_name,
    T1.assigned_user_link,
    T1.securitygroups,
    T1.ims_integration_number,
    T1.type,
    T1.status,
    T1.priority,
    T1.resolution,
    T1.work_log,
    T1.commission_date_c,
    T1.decommission_date_c,
    T1.frequency_c,
    T1.int_num_container_c,
    T1.internal_external_c,
    T1.help,
    T1.encryption_in_transit,
    T1.ims_ropa_ims_integration_1,
    T1.ims_dpia_ims_integration_1,
    T1.ims_data_sharing_ims_integration_1,
    T1.ims_integration_ims_data_flow_1
